attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: STOP FOREIGN LORRY DRIVERS PARKING OVERNIGHT IN LAYBYS WHICH ARE FOR ANYBODIES USE.THERE ARE SERIOUS HEALTH CONCERNS IN THIS FROM THE FOULING DONE BY THEIR BODILY FUNCTIONS AND THE BLOCKING OF WHAT SHOULD BE EMERGENCY PULL OFFS FOR ROAD USERS.KENT IS ONE OF THE WORST AREAS FOR THIS AND IS ONLY MADE WORSE WHEN OPERATION STACK IS USED.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
